English: BAZA TO YURI, THE ENEMY ATTACK IS GOING TO BEGIN SHORTLY. GET TO SAINT PHILLIPPE AND HELP ITS DEFENCE REPEL IT. BAZA OUT.
THEIR ATTACK IS SHATTERED, TIME TO COUNTERATTACK THEIR POSITIONS! ONWARDS TO MEAUX, COMRADES!
BAZA TO YURI, SMALL UNITS OF LIGHT TANKS AND INFANTRY WILL SUPPORT YOUR ATTACK, BUT IT IS MAINLY UP TO YOU TO BREAK THE ENEMY POSITIONS. GOOD LUCK. BAZA OUT.
YURI TO BAZA, MEAUX HAS BEEN TAKEN. OVER.
BAZA TO YURI, OUR FORCES WILL COVER THE VILLAGE. YOU ARE FREE TO MOVE ON. BAZA OUT.
YURI TO BAZA, TYRONE IS IN OUR HANDS. THE ENEMY IS RETREATING, OVER.
BAZA TO YURI, GOOD JOB. WE'RE SENDING SUPPORT TRUCKS TO YOU. WAIT FOR THEM OR CONTINUE ONWARDS. BAZA OUT.
YURI TO BAZA, WE ARE THROUGH THE NECK AND CLOSING IN ON MONTIGNAC. OVER.
BAZA TO YURI, EXCELLENT WORK. BE CAREFUL, MONTIGNAC IS THE CAPITAL CITY. IT IS SURE TO BE HEAVILY FORTIFIED AND GUARDED. GOOD LUCK, COMRADES. BAZA OUT.
YURI TO BAZA, WE'VE TAKEN MONTIGNAC! THE ENEMY IS EITHER DESTROYED OR RUNNING AWAY WITH ITS TAIL BETWEEN ITS LEGS. WE ARE VICTORIOUS, BAZA!

WELL DONE, YURI, TREMENDOUS WORK. WE'RE SENDING REINFORCEMENTS TO YOU, HOLD YOUR POSITIONS UNTIL THEY ARRIVE. THIS IS A GREAT VICTORY FOR THE MOTHERLAND THAT YOU JUST ACHIEVED, COMRADE. BE PROUD! BAZA OUT.
